query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_prices,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_prices,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 0 OR active IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inactive_prices
FROM prices;
